data.actual_result: You can see the Category A on the Notification Overrides list. (On Android, it's different. You cannot see the category).
data.expected_result: Notification overrides for Category A isn't supposed to be shown, since it's disabled for everyone.
data.short_description: You can set Notification Overrides for categories with "Read Text/Voice channels" for @ everyone permission off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create Category A, and make it a private category, with "Read Text/Voice channels" for @ everyone being disabled. - Next, create a channel in that same category. However, on the "Read Channel permission for @ everyone, either put it in the middle or allow it. Then, with another account that has @ everyone permission (default), check the notification settings and find the Category A.
